profile.name: ISO 19005-2:2011 - 6.4 Interactive Forms - 6.4.2 XFA forms - XFA key
profile.description: The document's interactive form dictionary that forms the value of the AcroForm key in the document's Catalog of a PDF/A-2 file, if present, shall not contain the XFA key.
profile.creator: veraPDF Consortium

rule.description: The document's interactive form dictionary that forms the value of the AcroForm key in the document's Catalog of a PDF/A-2 file, if present, shall not contain the XFA key.

error.message: The interactive form dictionary contains the XFA key
